title: Aidan O'Halloran
text:
Aidan O'Halloran is an Irish former <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
Career.
In his first season of senior rugby, O'Halloran played <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Fly-half">fly-half</a> for <a href="Young%20Munster">Young Munster</a> as they won the 1992–93 <a href="All-Ireland%20League%20%28rugby%20union%29">All-Ireland League</a>. He would go on to win two caps for <a href="Munster%20Rugby">Munster</a> in 1996, against <a href="Samoa%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Samoa</a> and <a href="Connacht%20Rugby">Connacht</a>.
